QuestData.Title: Muradin's Lament
QuestData.RewardText: Aye. I know this blade... and I will treasure it always - a moment of time that will be lost forever.$B$BYou have done me a great service, hero. I offer you a gift from the Frostborn dwarves. Do with it as you please, but do not forget those that assisted you in this monumental feat.
